title: Refusal or termination of plans
context: ยง88-220 Refusal or termination of plans. The state agency shall not finally refuse to approve a plan submitted by a political subdivision under section 88-218, and shall not terminate an approved plan, without reasonable notice and opportunity for hearing to the political subdivision affected thereby. [L 1953, c 217, ยง5(b); RL 1955, ยง6-196; HRS ยง88-220]
